key_features: The laptop includes various ports, a power adapter, and visible vents on the bottom. It also has labels indicating the model number.
description: The images collectively show a Lenovo ThinkPad X1 laptop in black color with the model number 21CB-01HGE. The laptop appears to be in used condition with some visible wear. The images include the front view of the open laptop, the closed laptop with its power adapter, side views, and the bottom view showing vents and labels.
